item.title: By: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Blog Archive » Oracle Buying Open Source Companies?
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Blog Archive » Oracle Buying Open Source Companies?
item.description: [...] BusinessWeek is reporting that Oracle is looking to buy more open source companies. Specifically they mention JBoss, Zend and Sleepycat. Nothing official has been announced yet, but keep in mind that it was only a few months ago when Oracle bought the company behind InnoDB (Innobase). [...]
item.content:encoded: […] BusinessWeek is reporting that Oracle is looking to buy more open source companies. Specifically they mention JBoss, Zend and Sleepycat. Nothing official has been announced yet, but keep in mind that it was only a few months ago when Oracle bought the company behind InnoDB (Innobase). […]
